article.title: L-3 to Provide Common Data Link
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: L-3 Communications Communication Systems, West, Salt Lake City, Utah, is being awarded a $16,920,823 modification to a previously awarded firm-fixed-price contract for the manufacture, test, delivery and support of the Common Data Link Hawklink system, including 31 AN/ARQ-59 radio terminal sets for the MH-60R aircraft. The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Md., is the contracting activity.
